toggle-toggle-sprint.name: Toggle Toggle Sprint
toggle-toggle-sprint.noYacl: This requires Yet Another Config Lib to be installed!
toggle-toggle-sprint.sprintOnDeath.descr: If enabled, your sprinting won't be broken upon respawning; only applies on 1.20.1 and above
toggle-toggle-sprint.toggleOnUse.descrip: If enabled, using a toggle key will also make you start sprinting/sneaking, instead of requiring the vanilla key to be pressed separately
toggle-toggle-sprint.sprintOnJoin.descri: If enabled, you'll start sprinting upon joining a world if your sprint key is set to toggle
toggle-toggle-sprint.sprintState.descrip: Changes your default state for sprinting when joining a world
toggle-toggle-sprint.sprintState.on: Your sprint option will always be set to Toggle when joining a world
toggle-toggle-sprint.sprintState.off: Your sprint option will always be set to Held when joining a world
toggle-toggle-sprint.sprintState.unchang: Your sprint option will never be changed when joining a world
toggle-toggle-sprint.sneakOnJoin.descrip: If enabled, you'll start sneaking whenever you join a world if your sneak key is set to toggle
toggle-toggle-sprint.sneakOnJoin.warning: WARNING: Some servers may consider this to be a cheat; use at your own risk!
toggle-toggle-sprint.sneakState.descript: Changes your default state for sneaking when joining a world
toggle-toggle-sprint.sneakState.on: Your sneak option will always be set to Toggle when joining a world
toggle-toggle-sprint.sneakState.off: Your sneak option will always be set to Held when joining a world
toggle-toggle-sprint.sneakState.unchange: Your sneak option will never be changed when joining a world
